rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample lighting and storage for footwear. Designed to incorporate Vastu principles by orienting the entrance towards an auspicious direction.

An open-plan living area connected seamlessly with the kitchen, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation. Vastu principles ensure positive energy flow from the entrance to this space.
A modern open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area, optimized for functionality with an emphasis on natural light and ventilation. The design incorporates Vastu guidelines for cooking spaces.
Adjacent to the living room, designed as a dining space that connects with the kitchen for convenience while providing adequate natural light and ventilation.

A spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and an adjoining balcony. Designed to maximize natural light and facilitate good air circulation, in alignment with Vastu principles for a restful space.
A second bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and an adjoining balcony. The design focuses on optimal natural light and ventilation, ensuring energy flow as per Vastu recommendations.
An expansive balcony attached to bedroom1 for outdoor relaxation and improved air circulation, contributing to the overall wellness of the space.
A similar spacious balcony adjoining bedroom2, designed to provide a serene outdoor retreat with ample natural light.

A multipurpose common area for joint family gatherings and recreational activities. It is designed with open spaces, abundant natural lighting, and adherence to Vastu principles ensuring harmonious energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards the auspicious direction as per Vastu norms, enhancing positive energy entry.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light and ventilation in the living area.
Large windows integrated into the kitchen to ensure ample natural light and proper ventilation.
Balcony access door ensuring a seamless connection between bedroom and outdoor balcony.
Balcony access door facilitating easy transition from bedroom to its adjoining balcony.
